resources.string: Help Xiaomi improve its products and services by sending anonymous diagnostic and usage data

"Surround sound settings only available for headphones"
"You can only use the EQ in Dolby music mode. Enable it now?"
Use Dirac Sound enhancer when using phone\'s speakers
You can only use Wi-Fi Display when Wi-Fi is enabled. Enable it now?
If you stop the Wi-Fi display session, your connection to %1$s will be terminated.
If you stop the Wi-Fi display session, your connection to %1$s and %2$s other devices will be terminated.
Having trouble accessing your device via computer?\nSelect your operating system:
Follow the steps in the Setup Wizard to complete installation.

"If the computer failed to detect your phone,
Try the following:

1) Reconnect the USB cable.

2) Reinstall the driver."
"If the computer failed to detect your phone,\nTry reconnecting the USB cable."

"If the computer failed to detect your phone,
Try the following:

1) Do a search for
Android File Transfer,
and run the software.

2) Reconnect the USB cable.

3) Reinstall the driver."

"If the computer failed to detect your phone,
Try the following:
1) Use the install tool "sudo aptitude install mtpfs libfuse-dev libmad0-dev"
2) Create a directory "mkdir" /media/mtp
3) Confirm user group permissions in the current fuse user group
4) Sign in again
5) Access mounted device mtpfs /media/mtp via File explorer; same as local directory
6) Uninstall device fusermount -u /media/mtp
 (Ubuntu 8.04)"
For Windows, download the driver and click Setup.exe to install\nGet the driver at http://miui.com/win
For OSX, download the driver and click AndroidFileTransfer.dmg to install\nGet the driver at http://miui.com/mac

Allow data exchange when your phone touches another device
You can beam a web page, a video, or other content from your screen to another device, by touching the devices together (typically back to back).
Make sure the two devices are touching, and then touch the content you want to beam.
Capture all Bluetooth HCI packets in a file
MIUI users can share public Wi-Fi networks (cafes, resteraunts, hotels, etc.) with one another.

Give back by sharing your public Wi-Fi networks with other MIUI users.

When you share your public networks,\n you can use other users\' networks too
If this is a public network, you can share it with other MIUI users.
You\'re connected to a public Wi-Fi network that has been shared by another user

To see available networks, turn Wi-Fi on
You don\'t have permission to change the Wi-Fi network.
To complete setup, your tablet needs access to Wi-Fi. After setup, you can switch between mobile data and Wi-Fi.
Press the Wi-Fi Protected Setup button on your router. It may be called \"WPS\" or contain this symbol:
Enter pin %1$s on your Wi-Fi router. The setup can take up to two minutes to complete.
Turn off Wi-Fi when not using it or when it isn\'t available
Back up app data, Wi-Fi passwords, and other settings to Google servers
Stop backing up your Wi-Fi passwords, bookmarks, other settings, and app data, and erase all copies on Google servers?
You can\'t configure an EAP Wi-Fi connection during setup. After setup, you can go to Settings > Wireless & networks.
Touch Next to continue with setup.\n\nTouch Back to connect to a different Wi-Fi network.
If you restrict background mobile data, some apps and services won\'t work unless you\'re connected to a Wi-Fi network.
If you restrict background mobile data, some apps and services won\'t work properly unless you\'re connected to a Wi-Fi network.
If you restrict background mobile data, some apps and services won\'t work properly unless you\'re connected to a Wi-Fi network.
Indicate which Wi-Fi networks are portable hotspots. Apps can be restricted from using these networks in the background. Apps will also notify you before using these networks for large downloads.
To select hotspots, turn Wi-Fi on.

You can share this device with other people by creating additional users. Each user has their own space, which they can customize with their own apps, wallpaper, and so on. Users can also adjust tablet settings like Wi-Fi that affect everyone.

After you create a new user, that person needs to go through a setup process.

Any user can accept updated app permissions on behalf of all other users.
Allow modification of Wi-Fi and Mobile settings
Pictures in the screensaver album will be displayed 5 seconds after the screen turns off.
Displaying screensaver will consume additional battery power.
All default apps will be restored to MIUI presets.
